name: Project Ceres(Alpha)
description:
You find yourself in a strange world after you wake up from a fall.  Your goal is to reach the surface again. In this strange world you'll find people that will help you but be careful because not everybody is friendly.

You can expect a fun 3d platformer with a low poly artstyle. Coding, Models, Character- Level Design and Animations are made by myself. So development is not that fast. But i'll try to work on the game in my free time. At the moment you can watch some footage of the game on the right side of the page.

Please note that "Project Ceres" is not the game's final name and that any screenshot or footage is still subject of change.

In the meantime you can download the free demo or play my other game:

https://waterfire.itch.io/after-life
